collection:
It is Workoutlytics' policy to respect your
privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website,
and other sites we own and operate.

## Information We Collect

We collect various types of information for your experience with
Workoutlytics.

This includes:

  * Log data when you access our services
  * Device information for analytics and service improvement
  * Personal information such as your athlete ID, activities, heart rate and power zones, and other related performance data
  * Usage data such as your interactions with the service, including page visits and API calls

## How We Use Your Information

We use the information we collect to:

  * Provide personalized analytics on your performance
  * Maintain and improve our services
  * Understand how you use our services to ensure technical functionality and user experience optimization
  * Communicate with you about service updates, offers, and promotions

## Your Data Rights

You have the right to:

  * Access the personal information we hold about you
  * Request the correction of inaccurate personal information
  * Request that we delete your personal information
  * Object to our processing of your personal information
  * Withdraw any consent you have given to data processing
  * Request a copy of your data in a portable format

## Cookies

We use cookies to collect information to improve our services for you.
